snippet.title: Cool Kid Cody - Season 3 Trailer
snippet.description:
Cool Kid Cody is an interactive point & click cartoon series! The first three episodes of each season are free. You can find them at the link below or get the bundles off Steam or Itch. Thanks for playing!

Free Episodes: https://store.steampowered.com/search/?sort_by=Price_ASC&term=cool+kid+cody&supportedlang=english&ndl=1

Season 1 (Steam): https://store.steampowered.com/bundle/25402/Cool_Kid_Cody__Season_1/
Season 2 (Steam): https://store.steampowered.com/bundle/33104/Cool_Kid_Cody__Season_2/
Season 3 (Steam): https://store.steampowered.com/bundle/42780/Cool_Kid_Cody__Season_3/

Season 1 (Itch): https://90percentstudios.itch.io/cool-kid-cody-s1
Season 2 (Itch): https://90percentstudios.itch.io/cool-kid-cody-s2
Season 3 (Itch): https://90percentstudios.itch.io/cool-kid-cody-s3

~~~

Peter, still a totally Average yet incredibly lame guy, is left in the aftermath of the twins' divine fight. Mini's evil ex has stolen her wings, taken over the school, and banished Cody to the void! And as if it couldn't get any worse, Peter's tasked himself with flying to him! Though ascension proves difficult, there may be hope yet: Why fly, when you can sink?
